title: thingaL maavadhanam
sahitya:
tingaL mAvadanam tigazhum kuramangai vaLLi maNALanukku shubha



anupallavi



mangaLam mayil vAhana kumAranukku



caraNam



ambikaiyAL varabAlanukku vinAyaka sOdara suguNALanukku
shambhu shankara guru shIlanukku kunjariyai maruvi magizh lOlanukku
vambavizh taN kaDam bhAranukkut-tirumAl maruganukku mAranukku
kumbhamunikku-pakAranukku kunjaradAsan kuDi kAkkum vEl vIranukku
